_meanings:
{@--2@} To be got or obtained, fall to
one's share; <ls>Bg. 6. 39</ls>; <ls n="Bg.">13. 18.</ls>

{@--2@} To 

offer, present any one with (<ab>acc.</ab>),
bring to; {#dizwyA tvamasi me DAtrA#} 
{#BItenevopapAditaH#} <ls>R. 15. 18</ls>, <ls n="R.">14. 8</ls>; <ls n="R.">16. 32</ls>;
<ls>Ms. 9. 72</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 9.">73</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">3. 96</ls>; sometimes
with <ab>dat.</ab>; <ls>Ms. 11. 77</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">9. 244</ls>; or
with <ab>loc.</ab>; <ls>Y. 1. 315.</ls>

{@--3@} ({%a%}) To
cause to happen or occur, bring
about; {#maraRamupapAdayet#} <ls>K. 36.</ls> ({%b%}) To
accomplish, effect, cause, do, 
perform; {#yAvattu mAnuzyake#} 
{#SakyamupapAdayituM#} <ls>K. 62</ls>, <ls n="K.">113</ls>, <ls n="K.">120</ls>, <ls n="K.">134</ls>; {#devakAryaM#}  
<ls>R. 11. 91</ls>; <ls n="R.">17. 55</ls>; <ls>Me. 29.</ls>

{@--4@} ({%a%}) To
make a statement, adduce, put 
forward. ({%b%}) To justify.
